attributes.action: No more muslim immigration into the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details:
We would like to see the Government introduce a policy of prohibiting the further immigration of muslims into the United Kingdom.

Recent events have proven that they can pose a severe security risk to the general population and that their allegiance is to their faith and not to the country which gives them a home.

The vast majority of muslims refuse to integrate into the host country's society and shall use any means possible to destroy the culture and heritage which they should be adopting, constantly advocating the introduction of Sharia Law.

Muslims are creating a huge division in British society and hold values that are totally against those of a progressive, democratic nation.

They will chip away at the very fabric of society, our laws, customs, heritage and traditions, through constant demands for change in their favour. They are followers of the only faith that does this and we, the British people, regardless of colour or creed, are totally sick of it.
